item.title: Coursera- GCP Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description: COURSE LINK GCP Professional Data Engineer Certification >> Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals Module Lab Exercises Module 2: Foundations of GCP Compute and Storage Create a Compute Engine Instance Interact with Cloud Storage Module 3: Data Analysis on the Cloud Setup Rentals Data in Cloud SQL Recommendations ML with Dataproc Module 4: Scaling Data Analysis: Compute with GCP Create ML dataset with BigQuery Carry out ML with TensorFLow Invoke Machine Learning APIs View my code on GitHub

item.title: GCP Professional Data Engineer Certification
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description: I am starting the process of becoming a Google Cloud Certified Professional Data Engineer. For exam prep, there are five recommended training courses to complete, which I am doing online through Coursera. Training Courses Google Cloud Platform Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals [IN PROGRESS] Leveraging Unstructured Data with Cloud Dataproc on Google Cloud Platform Serverless Data Analysis with Google BigQuery and Cloud Dataflow Serverless Machine Learning with Tensorflow on Google Cloud Platform Building Resilient Streaming Systems on Google Cloud Platform Resources Google Cloud Platform Why Google Cloud Platform?
